name: The Hellmaze
description:
Behold, The Hell Maze.

Controls: Arrow Keys to Move

Objective: Collect the brown targets

The Hell Maze is about a nightmare. It's not my nightmare, but maybe it's yours.

 At all times, it stores five inputs in a buffer. Once the buffer is full, it will begin executing them, but only as you repopulate it.

Don't mess up.

Class: Pixel Prototype

Assignment: Your Own Personal Nightmare
